title: I can’t do anything with this body

replies.msg:
I’m not very very fat but I’m just very unsatisfied with my body.
I’m on my track losing weight but I just lack the determination.
I’m working out regularly already. But how can I eat less and resist all the temptations?

I can’t do anything or think I’m worthy of anything with this body.

越壓制就越想食
建議你放鬆少少先
太harsh一定反效果

quote.msg:
I’m not very very fat but I’m just very unsatisfied with my body.
I’m on my track losing weight but I just lack the determination.
